original_title: Sri Lanka has become  the global hub for manufacturing Rigid Tyres – Minister of Industries
original_body_lines: Minister of Industries and Plantation Industries Dr Ramesh Pathirana said that Sri Lanka has become the global hub for manufacturing Rigid Tyres and thanked the Sri Lanka manufacturers including those who are in collaboration with international partners.

The minister made this revelation addressing researchers, scientists and industrial stakeholders who attended the ‘Rubber, Plastic and Fiber based Industry related innovations and research presentation and networking forum’ held at Waters Edge Hotel on Wednesday (26).
Related Topics:global hub for manufacturing Rigid TyresMinister of Industries and Plantation Industries
